title: Live Streaming
description: NiN SYSTEMS is prepared to create online full-scale live stream productions for virtual viewing, or for your hybrid live events that need to include a larger, virtual audience. Our audio visual production team will work with you one-on-one to provide live stream production support, including stage design, lighting, video, and audio solutions. We will ensure your virtual events are presented professionally, without risking the health of your attendees.You can focus on the content, while NiN SYSTEMS team works with any preferred platform: social media, Zoom, Microsoft Teams, internal meeting platforms, and other online conferencing tools. Whatever the size of your virtual event, NiN SYSTEMS can help you plan and execute in as little as 24 hours.Contact us today to schedule a complimentary consultation and see how NiN SYSTEMS can provide viable and cost-effective alternatives for in-person live events.

title: Stage Design
description: Celebrate the vibrant rhythms of Latin music at our fiesta fiesta! Salsa, merengue, and reggaeton will keep you dancing all night long. With decades of experience, NiN SYSTEMS knows how to design performance venues that are functional, beautiful, and occasionally mind-blowing. From general conception to the smallest details, our team has the passion and the know-how to realize any type of design, from smaller stages to spectacular large-scale creations.

title: Audio
description: We can create custom audio systems for any size band and any group of instruments, so that everyone in the audience enjoys full, crystal-clear sound. With a full range of state-of-the-art audio gear and a team of first-rate technicians, NiN SYSTEMS will ensure that you sound as good as you really are.
